sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Chart
    type="line"
    :width="width"
    :height="height"
    :data="data"
    :options="options"
  />
</template>

<script>
import { defineComponent, computed } from 'vue'
import { helper as $h } from '@/utils/helper'

export default defineComponent({
  props: {
    width: {
      type: Number,
      default: 0
    },
    height: {
      type: Number,
      default: 0
    },
    lineColor: {
      type: String,
      default: ''
    }
  },
  setup(props) {
    const data = computed(() => {
      return {
        labels: [
          'Jan',
          'Feb',
          'Mar',
          'Apr',
          'May',
          'Jun',
          'Jul',
          'Aug',
          'Sep',
          'Oct',
          'Nov',
          'Dec'
        ],
        datasets: [
          {
            label: '# of Votes',
            data: $h.randomNumbers(0, 5, 12),
            borderWidth: 2,
            borderColor: props.lineColor.length ? props.lineColor : '#3160D8',
            backgroundColor: 'transparent',
            pointBorderColor: 'transparent'
          }
        ]
      }
    })
    const options = computed(() => {
      return {
        legend: {
          display: false
        },
        scales: {
          xAxes: [
            {
              ticks: {
                display: false
              },
              gridLines: {
                display: false
              }
            }
          ],
          yAxes: [
            {
              ticks: {
                display: false
              },
              gridLines: {
                display: false
              }
            }
          ]
        }
      }
    })

    return {
      data,
      options
    }
  }
})
</script>
